title: Which Brown Auntie Energy Are You?
dek: Pick your Saturday vibes and we'll tell you exactly which type of auntie you are.

options.text: Hosting a cookout with the whole family
Planning the next big family event

questions.text: When someone asks for advice, you:

options.text: Tell them the hard truth they need to hear
Listen and help them figure it out
Share a Bible verse or life wisdom
Turn it into a group discussion
Solo trip to explore new cultures
Making sure everyone is fed and happy

The Nurturer.title: The Nurturer
The Nurturer.description: You're the auntie who makes sure everyone is fed, loved, and taken care of. Your home is always open, your food is legendary, and you remember everyone's favorite dish. You're the emotional backbone of the family.
The Nurturer.explanation: You picked all the caring, family-first options. Classic nurturer energy!
colony_prompts: Share your best family recipe in Woman Space.
Post about what family means to you in Culture x Life.

The Truth-Teller.title: The Truth-Teller
The Truth-Teller.description: You don't sugarcoat anything. You're the auntie who tells it like it is, whether people want to hear it or not. Your advice is direct, honest, and usually exactly what someone needs (even if they don't realize it yet).
The Truth-Teller.explanation: You value honesty over comfort. That's real auntie wisdom right there.
colony_prompts: Share your best piece of advice in The Yard.

The Believer.title: The Believer
The Believer.description: Faith guides everything you do. You're the auntie who has a prayer for every situation and keeps the family grounded in tradition and spirituality. Your wisdom comes from a higher place.
The Believer.explanation: Your choices showed strong faith and tradition. Stay blessed!
colony_prompts: Share a prayer or blessing in Culture x Life.

The Life of the Party.title: The Life of the Party
The Life of the Party.description: You bring the energy wherever you go! You're the auntie who turns every gathering into a celebration, knows all the latest dances, and makes sure everyone is having a good time. Life is too short to be boring.
The Life of the Party.explanation: You picked fun every time. The family needs that energy!
colony_prompts: Share your party planning tips in Woman Space.

The Visionary.title: The Visionary
The Visionary.description: You're always thinking ahead. You're the auntie who encourages everyone to dream bigger, try new things, and break out of their comfort zones. You're modern, forward-thinking, and all about growth.
The Visionary.explanation: You chose innovation and growth. That's visionary auntie energy!
colony_prompts: Share your 12-month goals in Business & Legacy.

seo.title: Which Brown Auntie Energy Are You? | Yelling Ant Quiz
seo.description: Find out which type of auntie you are in 60 seconds. Are you The Nurturer, The Truth-Teller, The Believer, The Life of the Party, or The Visionary?
